job_history.role_name: Lead Operations Engineer - Global Hawk Project
job_history.work_description: Managed all operational aspects of Global Hawk high-altitude, long-endurance UAS, (2 operational air vehicles, 3 ground control stations) and scientific payload integration. Overall leader for Global Hawk flight operations team, including maintenance personnel, avionics technicians and operations engineers.
Project Manager. Missile Defense Agency DC-10 WASP Structural Restoration: Managed $5M project to investigate structural deficiencies with MDA platform aircraft.
Planned test programs to evaluate operability, suitability, and engine/airframe integration and compatibility of F-16 propulsion systems.

job_history.role_name: Project Manager / Senior Flight Test Engineer
job_history.work_description: Project Manager/Test Director: Project manager on 18 test programs. Prepared detailed cost estimates for all phases of program utilizing test requirements documents.
Performed detailed test planning to efficiently evaluate the performance, handling qualities, mission suitability, specification compliance and airframe icing characteristics (where applicable).

projects.description: Developed initial Operational Concept for the Global Hawk UAS for NASA operations and generated testing roadmap to achieve successful initial operational capability of the NASA Global Hawk UAS
Managed a complex engine-airframe integration test program with an integrated test team of Army, airframe contractor and engine contractor personnel.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience managing complex projects, including a $5M project for the Missile Defense Agency and multiple test programs, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Flight Test Management
skills.explanation: Has led multiple flight test programs, including the Global Hawk UAS project, demonstrating expert-level proficiency in flight test management.

skills.name: Systems Integration and Test
skills.explanation: Has managed complex engine-airframe integration test programs and led integrated test teams, indicating expert-level mastery of systems integration and test.

skills.name: Aircraft Modification Management
skills.explanation: Has managed aircraft modification projects, including the Global Hawk UAS project, showing strong proficiency in aircraft modification management.

skills.name: UAS Operations
skills.explanation: Has experience with UAS operations, including the Global Hawk UAS project, indicating strong proficiency in UAS operations.

skills.name: Flight Test Engineering
skills.explanation: Has performed detailed test planning and evaluation of aircraft performance, handling qualities, and mission suitability, showing strong proficiency in flight test engineering.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has led teams, including the Global Hawk flight operations team, and managed personnel, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.
